Knowledge Knockout

Join us for an exciting platform that challenges creativity, technology, and critical thinking!

Event Format

Team Composition:

Teams of up to 4 members from the same college. Inter-college teams are allowed.

Rounds:

The event will consist of 3 rounds:

  • Round 1: General Knowledge Quiz
  • Round 2: Brain Teasers
  • Round 3: Rapid Fire

Rules & Regulations

  • Maximum team size: 4 members.
  • Each team must register before the event begins.
  • Inappropriate behavior or cheating will result in disqualification.
  • Teams must adhere to the event timeline and arrive on time.

Judging Criteria

  • Accuracy: Correct answers and solutions.
  • Speed: The quicker the response, the higher the points.
  • Creativity: Innovative answers during creative rounds.
